009package Ch26_MserFeatures;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.ImageStack;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016
017public class Show_Threshold_Stack implements PlugInFilter {
018        
019        private ImagePlus im;
020        
021        @Override
022        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
023                this.im = im;
024                return DOES_8G; // | NO_CHANGES;
025        }
026        
027        @Override
028        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
029                ImageStack stack = makeThresholdStack((ByteProcessor)ip);
030                new ImagePlus("ThresholdStack of " + im.getShortTitle(), stack).show();
031        }
032        
033        /**
034         * Creates a stack of binary images, one for thresholding the 
035         * given image at each gray vale 0,..,255.
036         * @param bp
037         * @return
038         */
039        private ImageStack makeThresholdStack(ByteProcessor bp) {
040                int width = bp.getWidth();
041                int height = bp.getHeight();
042                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(width, height);
043                for (int level = 0; level < 256; level++) {
044                        ByteProcessor bp2 = (ByteProcessor) bp.duplicate();
045                        bp2.threshold(level);
046                        stack.addSlice("Level " + level, bp2);
047                }
048                return stack;
049        }
050
051}
